overview:

TDGâ€™s unique approach involves the establishment of realistic goals and the development of a thorough plan. During this phase the clients are in placed in full contact with the TDG staff and their approval is required before moving into design and development. In fact, the quality and effectiveness of our website because of our approach has earned us the reputation of being one of the fastest growing web design companies in Charleston SC.

The Design Groupâ€™s specialty is building visually appealing, user friendly web sites that are built with search engines in mind. All TDG websites are developed with tomorrowâ€™s standards so that they will last for years. In addition, The Design Group is one of the few web design companies in Charleston that includes search engine optimization (SEO) features on all of their web sites.

Along with web design and digital marketing services, The Design Group also offers Charleston graphic design and photography services. From portraits and weddings to branding and brochure design, our professionals have the capabilities and resources to cover your needs.

Contact The Design Group (http://www.thedesigngrouponline.com) today and schedule a free consultation.
